translations: 鸽子；<非正式，美>（容易）上当受骗的人；<英>（自己的）责任，分内之事；<俚>己方飞机

sentences.sentence: A large Pigeon flew far above him.
sentences.translation: 一只大鸽子从他头顶上飞过。

sentences.sentence: Oh, dear Pigeon, how I wish I had your wings!
sentences.translation: 噢，亲爱的鸽子，我多么希望我有你的翅膀啊！

sentences.sentence: Toward evening the Pigeon said: "I'm very thirsty!"
sentences.translation: 傍晚时分，鸽子说：“我渴极了！”
